hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#exit 1
### copied from previous step. Just to be sure to delete un-needed files to save space # upon extraction -- you can delete the big .gz file (NEW: Aug 28, 2021) cd /extra/dumps/wikidata [ -f latest-all.json.gz ] && rm -f latest-all.json.gz || echo "File does not exist"
# working OK cd /extra/dumps/wikidata/wikimedia [ -f commonswiki-latest-pages-articles.xml.bz2 ] && rm -f commonswiki-latest-pages-articles.xml.bz2 || echo "File does not exist"
#works OK: wget -c -nv http://dumps.wikimedia.org/commonswiki/latest/commonswiki-latest-pages-articles.xml.bz2 # -nv means non-verbose but errors get printted out still.
#works OK: bzip2 -dkf commonswiki-latest-pages-articles.xml.bz2
#just temporary replacement: #which gzip
# should work -- delete .bz2 after extraction cd /extra/dumps/wikidata/wikimedia [ -f commonswiki-latest-pages-articles.xml.bz2 ] && rm -f commonswiki-latest-pages-articles.xml.bz2 || echo "File does not exist"
#exit 1 ##force stop OK
